text: Oskars Batņa (born 7 May 1995) is a Latvian professional ice hockey forward who is currently a playing for Dinamo Riga of the Kontinental Hockey League (KHL). ==Playing career== As a junior, Batņa played in Latvian junior leagues. In 2013 season he joined Dinamo Riga junior club HK Rīga of MHL He made his KHL debut on 22 August 2017 in a loss against Avangard Omsk, he scored his first KHL goal in win against Jokerit on 26 January 2018. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Latvian ice hockey centres Category:Dinamo Riga players Category:HK Riga players Category:Sportspeople from Riga
title: Oskars Batņa
